# yii2-material-design-lite
yii2-material-design-lite

### install

    composer require rafaelvaloto/yii2-material-design-lite 1.0.1 

### Usage
asset/AppAseet.php
    
        public $depends = [

            'yii\web\YiiAsset',

            'rafaelvaloto\mdl\material\MaterialDesignLiteAsset'

        ];
